definition: to learn of sth/to find out/to get news

sentences.english: This is the news yesterday from the Provincial Quality Supervision Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 這是記者昨日從省質監局獲悉的。

sentences.english: It will also help inform and shape public policy in this field.
sentences.chinese: 這也會幫助獲悉和形成在這一領域的公共政策。

sentences.english: Shortly afterwards admiral harwood learnt that the ship was weighing anchor.
sentences.chinese: 嗣後不久，哈伍德海軍上將獲悉“施佩”號在起錨了。

sentences.english: We note that you want additional samples of 5 yards per color way to be dispatched by air.
sentences.chinese: 獲悉貴方另要求航寄色位各5碼樣品，這是可以的。

sentences.english: Two weeks later, I learned, she went with a man to his flat.
sentences.chinese: 兩個星期後，我獲悉她跟一個男人回到了他的公寓。

sentences.english: This figure includes data for the current year and the one or two preceding years, where available.
sentences.chinese: 該數據包括本年及之前一或兩年所能獲悉的數據。

sentences.english: We learned the matter from an American paper.
sentences.chinese: 我們從一家美國報紙上獲悉此事。

sentences.english: It was spine-chilling to learn that a murderer was in our neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 獲悉殺人兇手就在我們附近，讓人不寒而慄。

sentences.english: Yang Fengmao learns and gold deep water Lin Ying baby be vivisection experiments, very worried.
sentences.chinese: 楊豐懋和金深水獲悉林嬰嬰被做活體實驗，萬分着急。

sentences.english: You have to be able to capture the interest of your readers and hold it from the beginning of your article to the end.
sentences.chinese: 你要能夠獲悉讀者的興趣，並投其所好貫穿文章始末。

sentences.english: I'm so glad to hear of your scholarship to Nelson .
sentences.chinese: 十分高興獲悉你得到了尼爾遜獎學金。

sentences.english: YangGuang learn news emergency to leave things to the father emperor.
sentences.chinese: 楊廣獲悉消息後緊急把事情告訴給了父皇。

sentences.english: We're told the two had in-depth discussions about the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 我們獲悉他們就當前的危機展開了深入的討論。

sentences.english: We note that you want additional samples of 5 yards per colour way to be dispatched by air.
sentences.chinese: 獲悉貴方另要求航寄色位各5碼樣品，這是可以的。

sentences.english: And what about sensitive data meant only for a single individual or organization?
sentences.chinese: 如果某些敏感數據只能由單一個體或組織獲悉怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Li Jun learned after mixed feelings, no blame li play glass was missing.
sentences.chinese: 李君獲悉之後百感交集，沒有再責怪黎璃當年玩失蹤。
